last_episode_to_air.name: Stuff'll Kill Ya
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ginger, worried about her new  course load in high school, ends up getting addicted to the "Mocha Locha  Frothinator."  Carl tries to walk the straight and narrow path, and is  tricked into thinking he has an incurable disease.

name: As Told by Ginger
overview: As Told by Ginger focuses on middle schooler Ginger Foutley who, with her friends, tries to become more than a social geek.

episodes.name: Ginger the Juvey
episodes.overview: When Ginger is invited to Courtney Gripling's party, she's under pressure to find the perfect gift, but will she resort to stealing?

episodes.name: Carl and Maude
episodes.overview: When Ginger and her friends go to the senior's home to do community service, Carl tags along and meets Maude, a granny who loves playing pranks and is every bit as disgusting as he is. Is true love blooming for Ginger's younger brother? And how will Courtney handle Carl's new flame when they both come over for dinner at the Foutley house?

episodes.name: Stealing First
episodes.overview: Why is Ginger so nervous about going on the ski trip with her school? Perhaps it's because she can't ski, or maybe it's because Carl and Hoodsey snuck along to cause mischief of their own, or maybe it's because Courtney is trying to get her to kiss that French foreign exchange student on the ski lift... Hmmm, doesn't seem like there's anything to worry about at all!

episodes.name: Sleep on It
episodes.overview: Courtney proves to be the one out of the loop when she looks to Ginger to show her how to play all the party games at the first Gripling sleep-over. Will Ginger show the popular kids the fine art of the slumber party, or will Carl and Hoodsey spoil all the fun?

episodes.name: Of Lice & Friends
episodes.overview: Dodie gets the job of making the school announcements and uses it as a forum to reveal gossip about Lucky Junior High. When a lice scare hits the school and Dodie finds out Courtney has been infected, will she make the announcement or will Ginger be able to convince her to keep her mouth shut.

episodes.name: Dare I, Darren?
episodes.overview: When Miranda suggests that Ginger and Darren are more than just friends, she begins to see him in a different way. Will Ginger and Darren bring their friendship to another level, or will these newfound feelings put a strain on their standing as best pals?

episodes.name: Hello Stranger
episodes.overview: Ginger gets a letter from her dad and decides to invite him to the arts fare at her school to hear her new poem. But the question remains... Will he show up? Meanwhile, Carl gets a dehydrated killer sea snake in the mail and Ginger's mom accidentally drinks it.

episodes.name: Cry Wolf
episodes.overview: Dodie accidentally reveals to Miranda one of Ginger's most closely guarded secrets... her mom won't let her shave her legs. Will Miranda end up spilling the beans to the rest of the school? Meanwhile, Carl becomes 'Wolf Boy' after stealing a janitors toupee.

episodes.name: The Right Stuff
episodes.overview: When Macie and Courtney take a high school French class, the older girls get jealous of the attention the boys are paying to Courtney. So when Courtney invites everyone over to Macie's for a pool party, will Macie spill the beans on some high school plans to "de-bikini" Courtney?

episodes.name: Kiss and Make Up
episodes.overview: Ginger's mom has a no make up policy... She won't allow her daughter to wear any make up at all until she's a teenager. Will she wait that long when school pictures are coming up? Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey take a trip with the garbage man.

episodes.name: The 'A' Ticket
episodes.overview: When Ginger and Ian Richton are paired up in chemistry class, Ginger thinks Ian is enthusiastic about it because he likes her, but Darren finds out it might be more about his grades. Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey compete to see who gets to play the glockenspiel for a town eccentric.

episodes.name: Come Back Little Seal Girl
episodes.overview: When Ginger has second thoughts about doing Macie and Dodie's traditional "Seal Girl" skit for the Lucky Junior High talent show, Macie decides to do it alone. Can Ginger save her from making a fool of herself, or will she be better than anyone thinks?

episodes.name: Blizzard Conditions
episodes.overview: A blizzard hits and the gang gets a day off from school. Carl and Hoodsey look after a dog named Muffin, while Ginger, Dodie and Macie try to write a report on survival. Meanwhile, Blake and Courtney get trapped in a car with their chauffer. When everyone ends up at Ginger's house with no power and no food, will they all make it out in one piece?

episodes.name: I Spy a Witch
episodes.overview: When Ginger is accused of defacing a statue at her school as a Halloween prank, she is dropped as the lead in the school musical. But will the ghost of Maude reveal who is truly guilty of the crime?

episodes.name: Deja Who?
episodes.overview: When Senator Ricci's son Michael decides to look at Lucky Junior High as a public school he might transfer to, Courtney wants to be his peer counselor to get close to what she considers "royalty". When she has an allergic reaction to cafeteria mystery meat and is bedridden, she has Ginger pretend to be her. But as Ginger starts becoming Courtney too well and ignoring Macie and Dodie, will she turn into someone else for good? Meanwhile, Hoodsey hits his head and gets amnesia.

episodes.name: An Even Steven Holiday Special
episodes.overview: When Ginger realises she's a quarter Jewish, she starts exploring her newly discovered heritage. But when she tells Dodie she won't trim her tree with her, will Ginger be turning her back on Christmas in favor of her Judaism? Meanwhile, Carl breaks the news to Hoodsey that Santa Claus doesn't exist, so Hoodsey sets out to prove him wrong by asking Santa to bring him his one Christmas wish... a visit from Carl and Ginger's father.

episodes.name: Piece of My Heart
episodes.overview: Everyone is going to the Sadie Hawkin's dance... Macie with her "Mystery Man" (actually Hoodsey), Miranda with Ian Richton, and Courtney... with Darren?!? Will Ginger get to the bottom of this and figure out why Courtney has a sudden interest in her good friend?

episodes.name: Never Can Say Goodbye
episodes.overview: Darren gets his braces removed and suddenly becomes attractive to every girl at school. Will Miranda ruin his friendship with Ginger when she becomes his girlfriend? Meanwhile, Brandon's monkey, Mr. Licorice, is missing and Carl and Hoodsey go looking for him.

episodes.name: Gym Class Confidential
episodes.overview: The girls prepare for a screening of a film about puberty in their gym class that Macie is dreading. Will she be able to sit through it or will she chicken out? Meanwhile, Hoodsey deals with being too embarassed to shower after his gym class.

episodes.name: Fast Reputation
episodes.overview: Ginger is sick of being called a "nice girl" by Courtney's friends, so she decides to sneak into a high school party with Dodie and Macie on a school night. There she meets Jake, a "cool" high schooler. When Miranda and Courtney find out and begin spreading rumors about Ginger and her new crush, can she put things right, or will the nice girl suddenly have a "bad reputation"? Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey set up a food cart.

episodes.name: Nurses Strike
episodes.overview: Ginger's mom is on strike and needs to bring money in, so she decides to do house cleaning. When Ginger needs $50 to go on a class trip to New York, will she end up helping out her mom without anyone finding out?

episodes.name: Trouble in Gal Pal Land
episodes.overview: When Courtney and Miranda get in a fight over which of their volleyball teams Ginger will play for, Miranda decides to replace Courtney with Ginger as her best friend. Will Ginger have to pick sides between them? Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey help Courtney's mom to win an election at her Country Club.

episodes.name: Sibling Revile-ry
episodes.overview: Ginger wins the student council election on the premise of having "big brothers" and "big sisters" to guide the younger elementary school trouble makers. When she assings George Magrority, a military academy kid, to her brother after he blows up the septic system at his school, will he have a positive influence on Carl, or will he go too far?

episodes.name: Losing Nana Bishop
episodes.overview: When Dodie's Nana dies, Ginger and Macie help her out, but Ginger realizes that she never knew her own grandma. Will her dad give her any insights into what she was like? Meanwhile, Hoodsey comes to terms with his own grief at Nana's funeral, but how will his family react when they find out that he has locked an iron mask around his head?

episodes.name: TGIF
episodes.overview: Friday the 13th, Carl's favorite holiday, begins with the Foutley car breaking down, Ginger's sweater getting ripped, and her school paper being blown away. Then a rare house-eating mold is discovered in Ginger's house that causes it to be condemned. Will the streak of bad luck continue, and could it get any worse? Maybe if Ginger gets completely fed up with her family...

episodes.name: Lunatic Lake
episodes.overview: Ginger, Carl and Macie go on vacation to Loon Lake with Dodie and her family, where an escaped "lunatic" from the insane asylum has been reported to be hiding. Will Carl and Hoodsey get to scare Blake, who is camping in the woods there as well, or will they be in for a scare themselves?  Meanwhile, Ginger and Macie deal with Dodie's mom Joann, who is a bit "high strung".

episodes.name: April Fools
episodes.overview:
Ginger decides to play an April Fools joke on Dodie by forging a love letter to her from Dustin, (a weirdo in her class that eats his sandwiches with chopsticks). Things get messy when Dodie admits to having a secret crush on Dustin, while Dustin reveals he really HAS sent a love letter, but to Macie! Will Ginger find a way to work it out?

Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey tell Blake they sold his tonsils to a witch doctor, causing him to become sick.

episodes.name: Ms. Foutley's Boys
episodes.overview: Ginger really wants her mom to start dating, but when she starts seeing Buzz the handyman (from the episode TGIF) and his three boys invade the Foutley house, Ginger mifht have second thoughts about it.

episodes.name: Love with a Proper Transfer Student
episodes.overview: Dodie has a crush on Joaquin Cortez, the new transfer student. But she may have some competition, not only from Mipsy, who likes him too, but also from Ginger. When the girls try out for the school musical "Mambo In The Catskills", and Ginger gets the lead opposite Joaquin, will the two best friends come to terms with the fact that they both have a crush on the same guy? Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey try to make aphrodisiacs.

episodes.name: Family Therapy
episodes.overview:
Macie thinks her parents are planning a birthday party for her because they are acting elusive, but they actually forget the date. When she confronts them about it, they throw her a birthday party suited for a 4 year old, not a 13 year old. Will Macie show her parents how to treat her like a young lady and not a little kid, or will she enjoy this trip back to her childhood?

Meanwhile, Mipsy, who has her birthday the same day, throws a giant party, and Carl gets scared of a naked mole rat.

episodes.name: New Girl in Town
episodes.overview:
A new student, Laticia Bowers, comes to Lucky Junior High. Her quirky behavior and the fact that she's a mortician's daughter makes her an outcast and target of gossip with the rest of the students. When Ginger and her pals accept her as a friend, will they get Courtney and the "dominant social group" to go to a party at her funeral home house?

Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey go to Brandon's birthday party.

episodes.name: Mommie Nearest
episodes.overview:
When Courtney's mother gets hospitalized from a botched plastic surgery, Courtney decides to stay with Ginger and her mom. Will she warm her way into Mrs. Foutley's heart over Ginger?

Meanwhile, Carl wants to get a chin implant.

episodes.name: Ginger's Solo
episodes.overview:
When Ginger fings out that the marching band at her school is going to play at Heathered Hills, where Sasha is a student, she joins up as the extra grande triangle player. Will she rekindle her summer love or will he end up disappointing her?

Meanwhile, Hoodsey and Carl become psychics to raise money.

episodes.name: And She Was Gone
episodes.overview:
When Ginger enters a writing competition and writes a story called "And She Was Gone", it causes Ms. Zorski to think Ginger might be suicidal. Can she convince her teacher and the school psycologist that it was just a work of fiction?

Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey try to make a student, Noelle Sussman, disappear with vanishing cream. When they succeed after they discover she might be the perfect girl for them, can they bring her back?

episodes.name: Next Question
episodes.overview:
When Ginger gets a crush on her English teacher and Quiz Team leader Mr. Gardner, what will he say when she asks him out on a date?

Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey plot to kidnap the famous Groundhog Pawtucket Pete in order to sell more of their hand-woven scarves.

episodes.name: No Hope for Courtney
episodes.overview:
Ginger and her friends decide to help a Lucky Junior High School girl named Hope to gain popularity by offering her some social and fashion tips. When she takes to the advice so well that she challenges and beats Courtney's reign as the most popular girl in school, will Courtney be able to regain her title?

Meanwhile, Carl causes his teacher Mrs. Gordon to retire and get replaced by music teacher Hepcat Hepper. Will he convince her to come back?

episodes.name: Driven To Extremes
episodes.overview:
Ginger's new substitute teacher is an elderly lady named Ms. Grimley who rules her class with an iron fist. When she assigns Ginger, Courtney and Miranda an 17,000 word essay on the cotton gin, the students decide to get even. But will their plans for revenge end up back-firing?

Meanwhile, Carl and Hoodsey try to teach Mr. Licorice an act for the upcoming pet show... by showing him how to ride a motorcycle.

episodes.name: Wicked Game
episodes.overview:
When Ginger returns from Avalanche Art Academy and ignores everyone around her but Darren, will Macie and Dodie join forces with Mipsy and Miranda to get them to break up?

Meanwhile, Noelle loses Carl in a card game to Polly Schuster, a younger kid who is obsessed with birds.

episodes.name: The Easter Ham
episodes.overview: Ginger is throwing a party for  Darren that every kid in the school wants to attend.  But when Lois and  Joann Bishop get into a fight at the grocery store over the last Easter  ham on the shelf, Joann bans Hoodsey and Dodie from seeing Carl and  Ginger.

episodes.name: About Face
episodes.overview: Joann Bishop gets a job teaching  home economics at the middle school that leaves Dodie mortified when  Joann starts hanging with the "cool girls" at school.

episodes.name: Fair to Cloudy
episodes.overview: Ginger invites Darren to the BFF  yearly tradition of going to the county fair, much to the dismay of  Dodie, who in turn invites Courtney to annoy Ginger.  Carl and Hoodsey  tag along and end up freeing a "two headed" pony from the Nature's  Oddities Tent.

episodes.name: Heat Lightning
episodes.overview: When emotions stir in Ginger upon  seeing Sasha again when she goes back to Camp Caprice, doubt creeps into  Ginger's feelings on her relationship with Darren.

episodes.name: Ten Chairs
episodes.overview: Unbeknownst to Lois, Ginger invites Jonas to Thanksgiving dinner.  Tensions mount when Carl seems to favor Dr. Dave over his natural  father, and the assembled guests, including Mrs. Dave and the Bishop  family are somewhat less than amicable.

episodes.name: Stuff'll Kill Ya
episodes.overview: Ginger, worried about her new  course load in high school, ends up getting addicted to the "Mocha Locha  Frothinator."  Carl tries to walk the straight and narrow path, and is  tricked into thinking he has an incurable disease.
